backend/main.mo: Defines photo, album, user profile types and maps, with authorization checks and CRUD operations for profiles and albums.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to short human-written summaries of their functionality.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing prerequisites and steps for local and production IC deployments.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining color tokens, themes, and global styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root container and main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routes, layout, theming, and authentication-guarded pages for the React app.
Editable album name component with save and cancel logic using updateAlbumName mutation.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Sign-in/out button handling Internet Identity authentication and session clearing.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with branding, navigation, auth controls, copy-link button, and help dialog trigger.
frontend/src/components/PhotoCaptionEdit: Provides an inline caption editor for a photo with save and cancel handling using mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/PhotoGrid.tsx: Renders a responsive grid of photos and opens a viewer when an image is clicked.
frontend/src/components/PhotoReorderCont: Offers move up/down controls to reorder photos in an album and updates the backend order.
frontend/src/components/PhotoUploadPanel: Handles multi-photo uploads with progress tracking, validation, and success/error states.
frontend/src/components/PhotoViewer.tsx: Displays a modal photo viewer with navigation, download, caption editing, and optional reorder controls.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Shows a dialog prompting new users to enter a name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuth.tsx: Gates content behind authentication, showing loading or sign‑in prompts as needed.
frontend/src/components/ShareSettingsPan: Manages creation, display, copying, and revocation of share links for an album.
frontend/src/components/TroubleshootingD: A dialog component offering troubleshooting tips and allowing users to copy the app link or perform a hard refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides authentication and authorization state, including identity, user profile, and profile setup logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login/logout methods, and status handling via a provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, albums, and photos through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light and dark theme variables and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AlbumDetailPage.tsx: Displays an album’s details with photo grid, upload panel, share panel, and album name editing, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/AlbumListPage.tsx: Renders the album list with a hero section, loads albums, and provides a dialog form to create new albums.
frontend/src/pages/SharedAlbumPage.tsx: Displays a read‑only shared album by shareId, handling loading, error states, and showing a photo grid.
frontend/src/utils/appLink.ts: Provides helpers to get the current app URL and copy it to the clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including support for hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Metadata describing the project state, requirements, existing features, and known deployment issue.
